jcr:root.jcr:description:
Renders two dropdown fields on the page. Both the dropdown fields render options from a json file that is uploaded in the DAM.
Contents in Second dropdown fields are dependent upon the option selected in First Dropdown field.
If the json file path is not rendered in the dialog, then this component would show static list of options.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Vehicle Make- Model
